# Application examples

<th><toc>
<li> Deterministic linear and second-order cone programs</li>

<tr><th><toc>
<li> Robust optimizaiton models </li>
<ul class="a">

  <li> <a href="example_ls">Adaptive robust optimization for a lot-sizing problem </a></li>

</ul>

</ul>
